original_text: You must keep awake and you must pray. Then you will not want to do something wrong. You really want to do the right thing, but your body is weak.’
korean_text: 시험에 들지 않게 깨어 있어 기도하라 마음에는 원이로되 육신이 약하도다 하시고

sentences.original_text: Then you will not want to do something wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 잘못된 것을 하고 싶지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: You really want to do the right thing
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 정말 올바른 것을 하고 싶어한다
